es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.rec

Interface Recommender<U,I>

  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    I - type of the items
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FastRecommender<U,I>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFastRecommender, AbstractRecommender, FastEnsembleRecommender, FastRankingRecommender, FMRecommender, ItemNeighborhoodRecommender, LDARecommender, MFRecommender, PopularityRecommender, RandomRecommender, RerankingRecommender, UserNeighborhoodRecommender

    public interface Recommender<U,I>
    Recommender interface. All static recommendation algorithms implement this interface.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Free recommendation.
      Recommendation<U,I> getRecommendation(U u, int maxLength)

    • Method Detail

      • getRecommendation

        Recommendation<U,I> getRecommendation(U u)
        Free recommendation. Generate recommendations without any restriction on the items being recommended.
        Parameters:
        u - user to be issued a recommendation
        Returns:
        a recommendation list

      • getRecommendation

        Recommendation<U,I> getRecommendation(U u,
                                      int maxLength)
        Free recommendation. Generate recommendations without any restriction on the items being recommended, but with a limit on the list size.
        Parameters:
        u - user to be issued a recommendation
        maxLength - maximum length of recommendation
        Returns:
        a recommendation list

      • getRecommendation

        Recommendation<U,I> getRecommendation(U u,
                                      Predicate<I> filter)
        Filter recommendation. Recommends only the items that pass the filter.
        Parameters:
        u - user to be issued a recommendation
        filter - filter to decide which items might be recommended
        Returns:
        a recommendation list

      • getRecommendation

        Recommendation<U,I> getRecommendation(U u,
                                      int maxLength,
                                      Predicate<I> filter)
        Filter recommendation. Recommends only the items that pass the filter up to a maximum list size.
        Parameters:
        u - user to be issued a recommendation
        maxLength - maximum length of recommendation
        filter - filter to decide which items might be recommended
        Returns:
        a recommendation list

      • getRecommendation

        Recommendation<U,I> getRecommendation(U u,
                                      Stream<I> candidates)
        Candidates ranking. Create a list that may contain only the items in the candidates set.
        Parameters:
        u - user to be issued a recommendation
        candidates - candidate items to be included in the recommendation
        Returns:
        a recommendation list
